fields.description:
{html}

G2 (2.2) G1 (1.6) TiMobile SDK 1.5.0.add5e1

1.BaseUI>Views>Scroll Views>scroll views text area
2.tap into the lowest field, type a few lines of text.

results: the field is obscured by both the keyboard and the predictive text field.

expected: push field up to reveal text being typed/reveal text

{html}
fields.summary: Android: View should scroll, contents of textArea are obscured by keyboard

comments.body:
Tested on a Samsung Galaxy S2 using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce the issue. The textarea automatically scrolls up and shows the correct lines, the keyboard doesn't cover it up anymore. 

Ticket marked as resolved.

Tested using Galaxy S4 Android version 4.4.2
Mac osx 10.9.4 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535
Titanium SDK, build:  3.3.0.GA
Node.JS Version: v0.10.28 
NPM Version: 1.4.9 
acs@1.0.15 
alloy@1.4.0
npm@1.4.9 
titanium@3.3.0 
titanium-code-processor@1.1.1
KS version 3.3.0
<guid>cd4da554-3d80-44ca-b712-a7acfd304973</guid>

View scrolls with keyboard up. When focus  in a third text area, it is not obscured by keyboard.
